documentation.text:
@dev if invalid outcome, simply pay out interest in proportion to bets across all tokenAddresses
 @dev i.e. as if all the outcomes 'won'

@notice gets the winning outcome from realitio
 @dev this function call will revert if it has not yet resolved
@notice has the question been finalized on realitio?
@notice common function for all incoming DAI transfers

@dev change state to WITHDRAW to lock contract and return all funds
 @dev in case Oracle never resolves

circuitBreaker().details: change state to WITHDRAW to lock contract and return all fundsin case Oracle never resolves

getWinningsInvalid().details: if invalid outcome, simply pay out interest in proportion to bets across all tokenAddressesi.e. as if all the outcomes 'won'

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
